description: Prior Approval (Telecommunications) for the installation of 1 no. CTIL tripod with 2 no. antennas, installation of 4 no. replacement antennas to existing tripods, replacement of existing 1 no. cabinets and ancillary works in order to upgrade the existing equipment to provide 5G mobile service.
decision_conditions:
DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:



Site Location Plan; 164669- 22-150- MD016 Rev 16; 164669- 22-100- MD016 Rev 16; 164669- 22-101- MD016 Rev 16;  Cornerstone General Background Information (England) V.2; ArqivaSS/206422/Kingsland Green TE dated 11 September 2020; DECLARATION OF CONFORMITY PUBLIC RF EXPOSURE GUIDELINES Dated 11 August 2020; 5G Nation June 2018; The Benefits of Mobile Connectivity by Arqiva

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
